# kaleido_platform_firefly_subscription (Resource)

A FireFly subscription that can forward events to webhooks or other transports.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `config_json` (String) JSON configuration for the subscription (transport, filter, options). For webhook subscriptions, webhook-specific fields like 'url', 'method', 'headers', 'query', 'tlsConfigName', 'retry', and 'httpOptions' should be set directly in the 'options' object. See https://hyperledger.github.io/firefly/latest/reference/types/subscription/ for the full schema. Note: FireFly subscriptions are immutable - changes require replacement.
- `environment` (String) Environment ID
- `name` (String) Subscription name
- `namespace` (String) FireFly namespace name
- `service` (String) FireFly Service ID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
